title: The Run
description: “I’m not going to let anything happen to you. You’re mine, and I’m yours. No one is taking you from me.”  After her mother’s death and her father’s abandonment, Rae has been given responsibility to raise her five siblings at the tender age of sixteen. But with her eighteenth birthday comes big changes. One of them being eligibility for a ritual called The Run.  Rae is being given the chance to find her other half, something that werewolves seek from the age of first shift. Between multiple jobs and handling her sister Cleo's rebellious phase, Rae's sure a mate will only add to her burden.  But Colton is so much better than she thought he'd be. Not only is he handsome, caring, and quite tempting, but he's also the Beta Male of his pack. Which means Rae's soon going to be his Beta Female.  But events of Rae's past start to uncover a secret that could completely change her fate. Doubts arise, and Rae finds herself in the middle of a brewing war.  Is Colton really Rae's true mate? Or is she meant to be with someone else? Will she ever find peace in her already upside down world?  Grab a copy now of this paranormal novel and get a fix of romance and action all in one.
author: Amber Kalkes
